div.p: Tells a receiver to ignore just the local markup tags (local_markup, local_header, local_attr) when value="markup", or to ignore the local markup tags and all contained content when value="all"

valueString.value: Lock all vaue sets untouched since 2014-03-26 to trackingId 2014T1_2014_03_26

description.value: Tells a receiver to ignore just the local markup tags (local_markup, local_header, local_attr) when value="markup", or to ignore the local markup tags and all contained content when value="all"
